channel.title: Congratulations to our newest moderator: Archer!
channel.description:
Congratulations to the [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=19676]newest member[/url] of the MoparScape moderation team! We have yet another person to help us enforce the rules and be a boring "told-you-so". Let's see what happens with this new, modified moderation team, and how it manages MoparScape as summer creeps around the corner.
-MoparScape moderation team

item.title: Congratulations to our newest moderator: Archer!
